description: Introducing the amCase 11.6-inch Case for Acer C720/C720P Chromebook/Samsung Chromebook/Samsung Chromebook 2/Apple MacBook Air/Netbook/HP Chromebook 11/Acer C710/Surface Pro 3/Lenovo THINKPAD Helix (Tablet Only).This protective, neoprene, cushioned case snugly conforms to your devices' shape, while the padded texture cushions it like bubble wrap. The material helps absorb shock from dings and bumps, while withstanding daily wear-and-tear. The case also touts a scratch-resistant inner lining to help keep your device's screen looking pristine. Additional storage space in the front is convenient for cables, adapter and other accessories. Slim-line design and handle allow this case to be carried solo or fit in your favorite bag.Works with:Samsung Chromebook 2 11.6" (11.40 x 8.06 x 0.66 inches)Samsung 11.6" Chromebook Series 3 (11.4 x 8.19 x 0.69 inches)Samsung Silver 11.6" (11.6 x 8.09 x 0.69 inches)HP Chromebook 11 (11.7 x 7.6 x 0.69 inches)HP Pavilion Touchsmart 11.6" (11.4 x 8.53 x 0.87 inches)Acer C720/C720P Chromebook (11.3 x 8.0 x 0.8 inches)Acer C710 Chromebook (11.2 x 7.95 x 1.09 inches)Acer Aspire One 11.6" (11.2 x 7.91 x 1.0 inches)Acer Ultrabook 11.6" (11.2 x 7.70 x 0.48 inches)Acer Sleekbook 11.6" (11.38 x 8.11 x 0.83 inches)Lenovo THINKPAD Helix Tablet (11.7 x 7.36 x 0.51 inches)Apple Macbook Air (11.8 x 7.56 x 0.67 inches)Surface Pro 3 (11.5 x 7.93 x 0.3 inches)For other devices, please check the dimensions before purchase.Dimension:Size (LWH): 12.4 x 8.6 x 1.0 inches (31.5 x 22 x 2.5 cm)Weight: 9.1 ozColor:BlackWarranty:30-Day Money Back Guarantee12 Month Replacement Warranty
